comment: One of my favorite teachers in Kennesaw so far. Great guy and cares about his students. Four roleplay videos that are the tests for this class. Quizzes every week but easy and open book. He does grade attendance but only 5%.
Chill professor, chapter quizzes can be challenging, but everything else is easy. He wants you to do well in his class, and it shows.

Professor Scruggs is a great professor who truly cares for his students. Provides a real world insight into the world of selling and his main concern is on students being able to apply information and tactics to a real world scenario. The quizzes can be difficult but they're open note. I learned a lot from him and if I could take him again I would.

I loved taking Professor Scruggs! This was his first semester teaching. Super chill, very understanding, gave lots of grace when needed. Gentle with grading the 4 roleplays. Beware of difficult quizzes, though. He will learn your name if you come to class regularly. Brought us little treats on occasion. Great guy and great professor! Take him!
He was a great professor. Very engaging and gave lots of real-world examples.

This was his first semester teaching, so there were a couple of bumps, but he is obviously caring for us, students. He brings a lot of real-world experience to the table. Gives great advice on career topics. Open note quiz each week. Attendance is a grade. Role-plays are fun bc he just wants you to get comfortable speaking professionally. Take him!
